directions: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat.  Saute onion, bell pepper and garlic.  When onion is translucent add salt and tomato paste.  Reduce heat to low and cook 2 minutes.  Stir in the beans and rice.

Pour the liquid from the beans into a large measuring cup and add enough water to reach a volume of 2 1/2 cups; pour into beans.  Cover and cook on low for 45 to 50 minutes, or until liquid is absorbed and rice is cooked.
ingredients: 1 (15.25 ounce) can kidney beans, drained with liquid reserved
title: Cuban Beans and Rice
